name: Mono Development Environment
postCreateCommand: sudo apt install ca-certificates gnupg && sudo gpg --homedir /tmp --no-default-keyring --keyring /usr/share/keyrings/mono-official-archive-keyring.gpg --keyserver hkp://keyserver.ubuntu.com:80 --recv-keys 3FA7E0328081BFF6A14DA29AA6A19B38D3D831EF && echo 'deb [signed-by=/usr/share/keyrings/mono-official-archive-keyring.gpg] https://download.mono-project.com/repo/ubuntu stable-focal main' | sudo tee /etc/apt/sources.list.d/mono-official-stable.list && sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y mono-devel nuget && nuget restore
